content:
ChangeRequest:
  - RemoveFeature: 
      - Counter
  - AddFeature: 
      - OnboardingFlow:
          AppName: Gyde
          Pages: 
            - WelcomePage:
                Content: 'Get Started', 'Experience luxury travel with ease. Register and manage your bookings seamlessly.'
                Button: 'Next'
            - AuthenticationOptionsPage:
                Content: 'Continue with Phone', 'Continue with Email'
                Button: 'Next'
            - PhoneNumberInputPage:
                Content: 'Add Your Phone', 'Enter your phone number to get yourself verified and ready to start your ride.', 'Phone Number'
                Button: 'Next'
            - VerificationCodePage:
                Content: 'Enter Code', 'We sent verification code to your phone number +65 8123 4567'
                Button: 'Next'
            - EmailCollectionPage:
                Content: 'Stay Connected', 'To provide you with tailored services and updates, please share your email with us.', 'Email Address'
                Button: 'Next'
            - WelcomeConfirmationPage:
                Content: 'Welcome Aboard!', 'You've unlocked access to exclusive, personalized chauffeur services with Gyde.', 'Experience comfort, Tailored to your needs'
                Button: 'Continue'
            - TermsAndConditionsPage:
                Content: 'By continuing, you have read and agree to our terms and condition.', 'Please read these terms of use carefully before using this platform', 'Welcome to Gyde! By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.'
                Button: 'Continue'
          Branding: 'Gyde'

overview: 
  - The application will undergo significant changes to remove the existing counter feature and introduce a new onboarding flow for the Gyde luxury chauffeur service app.
  - This includes adding multiple onboarding pages with sliding transitions and updating the app's branding to reflect Gyde.
new_features: 
  - Welcome Page with 'Get Started' and introductory text
  - Authentication Options Page with 'Continue with Phone' and 'Continue with Email' options
  - Phone Number Input Page with phone verification prompt
  - Verification Code Page for entering received code
  - Email Collection Page for collecting user email
  - Welcome Confirmation Page with confirmation message
  - Terms and Conditions Page with terms acceptance message
modified_features: 
  - Update app branding to Gyde
  - Modify navigation flow to include onboarding sequence
removed_features: 
  - Counter feature from HomeView and HomeViewModel
architectural_changes: 
  - Introduce new routes for onboarding pages in app.router.dart and update dependency injection in app.locator.dart to accommodate new services if needed.
cross_cutting_concerns: 
  - Ensure consistent Gyde branding across all new and existing UI components
  - Implement sliding transitions for onboarding pages
  - Update state management to handle new onboarding flow and user authentication state
